Title: Osimhen rejects Al-Hilal’s £25m offer, open to Man United move
Summary: Victor Osimhen has turned down a lucrative offer to join Saudi Arabian side Al-Hilal . The move opens the door to a potential move to Manchester United this summer . According to sources familiar with the negotiations, the Saudi Pro League club met with the Nigerian midfielder .

Title: In Pictures: Yoruba culture shines at Ojude Oba 2025 festival
Summary: The 2025 edition of the iconic, Ojude Oba, festival once again brought the ancient city of Ijebu-Ode to life with a dazzling display .

Title: inDrive launches cancellation protection to boost courier safety in Nigeria
Summary: inDrive has introduced a new feature called the Sender-Validated Post-Pickup Cancellation system for its courier service in Nigeria . This rollout follows a pilot phase and aims to address user concerns about safety .

Title: If you never existed, I won’t exist, Rema tells D’banj
Summary: Nigerian Afrobeats star, Divine Ikubor, better known as Rema, has paid tribute to music legend D’banj . Rema made the statement on Sunday night, June 8, during his performance .

Title: Army arrests 43 suspected oil thieves, dismantles 27 bunkering sites
Summary: Nigerian Army’s 6 Division has arrested 43 suspected oil thieves and dismantled 27 illegal bunkering sites across the Niger Delta . Operation aimed at combating oil theft and pipeline vandalism . The crackdown was carried out in collaboration with the Nigerian Army .

Title: Hajj 1446: Saudi Arabia announces end of pilgrimage
Summary: Mishaal said that over 1.6 million pilgrims participated in the holy pilgrimage . Over 1,506,576 pilgrims arrived from outside the Kingdom .

Title: Ndume insists Tinubu’s govt has been hijacked by ‘kleptocrats’
Summary: Senator Ali Ndume insists Tinubu’s govt has been hijacked by ‘kleptocrats’ and “kakistocrats”

Summary: He also urged protesters to stay peaceful, warning that those who instigate violence will be arrested . The president also urged people to remain peaceful .

Title: Several injured in suspected Edo cult clash
Summary: Community leaders have called on the Edo State Government and the Nigerian Police Force to intervene urgently . Community leaders call on the state government and the police to intervene .

Title: ATP rankings: Sinner remains number 1, Alcaraz gains zero point, Djokovic rises
Summary: Sinner, who lost to Alcaraz in the semi-finals last year, gained 500 points for reaching this year's final . Sinner remains number 1, while Alaraz gains zero point, Djokovic rises .

Title: Inter Milan appoint Cristian Chivu head coach
Summary: Cristian Chioio is leaving Parma to take over at the end of the season . He has agreed a two-year deal with the Italian club . The deal ends up being the first time he has left Parma since leaving the club .

Title: Why Awujale was absent from 2025 Ojude Oba — Festival coordinator
Summary: The Awujale and paramount ruler of Ijebu land, Oba Sikiru Adetona, could not attend the annual festival held on Sunday . The monarch, who, for decades, usually sits in his majesty to receive the homage from the thousands of guests, tourists and people from the Ijubu land during the

Title: Presidential aide Audu resigns
Summary: The Senior Special Assistant to President on Public Affairs, Aliyu Audu, tendered his resignation . Audu thanked the President for the opportunity to serve my fatherland under your visionary leadership . The Presidency is yet to respond to Audu’s resignation .

Title: Tinubu’s aides deceiving him, damaging his image - Ndume
Summary: Borno South Senatorial District, Ali Ndume, has alleged that presidential aides who are meant to assist President Bola Tinubu are deceiving him on national issues . He added that some of them are even damaging the President’s image . The senator also criticised the disconnect between the presidency and ordinary Nigerians, saying

Title: Suspected assailants kill 45-year-old man in Gombe
Summary: The Gombe Police Command has confirmed the death of a 45-year-old man, Ahmed Aliyu, who was fatally attacked by unidentified assailants in Hammadu Kafi, in the Akko Local Government Area of the state . The Police Command described the act as “senseless and unwarranted,” and
